EmailTemplate.name: 201804_Global_Email_EGPWS_MK-VIII_mih.201804_Global_Email_EGPWS_MK-VIII_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: MK VIII EGPWS Terrain Database Release Notification - Version 602
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> DearÂ {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}}, Honeywell has released a new worldwide MK VIII EGPWS Terrain Database - version 602 together with its service information letter D201802000014. This latest terrain database version is an update to the previous version 601 and adds several new airports, runways and obstacles while improving terrain mapping and resolution.
The databases and supporting documentation such as service information letters, certificates of conformance & ATP matrix file can be downloaded by visiting ads.honeywell.com <[[https://ads.honeywell.com/?mkt_tok=eyJpIjoiWkdZelpqZGhPR016TmpabSIsInQiOiJHRVNjZlJhV0VMdnVUdEswYWtxeldRRFwveGdha2x2aTkwWTBmcHRwSHg5UXJqMHZ3cjlwSklBeWF2Sm15eGlKTTVWb01SRGJ4bFJyRXlvUUtIaHlmeXc9PSJ9]]> (login required). EGPWS database search tools and change info are located at that same address (no login required). Look under the search tab and the change info tab. A letter of acceptance (LOA) document is located under the documents archive tab for applicable configurations. A release statement, located under the updates tab, may be referenced to confirm the status of the LOA.
Database download and media creation capability for all EGPWS products now available in the OneNav+ tool, version 1.21.0 or a higher version needed (no license required), additional OneNav+ features are being developed for EGPWS databases and will be available in future releases.
Please click here <[[mailto:dsa@honeywell.com?subject=EGPWS MK VIII Query]]> if you have any technical questions concerning the database.
The URL www.egpws.com <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/enhanced-ground-proximity-warning-system]]> will take you directly to the new Honeywell EGPWS page. From there you can view product Information, or jump to the EGPWS technical data site <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/account/login?returnUrl=%2FRedirects%2FSSO%2Fegpws]]> (login required) or the Aerospace Software and Database Services site <[[https://ads.honeywell.com/?mkt_tok=eyJpIjoiWkdZelpqZGhPR016TmpabSIsInQiOiJHRVNjZlJhV0VMdnVUdEswYWtxeldRRFwveGdha2x2aTkwWTBmcHRwSHg5UXJqMHZ3cjlwSklBeWF2Sm15eGlKTTVWb01SRGJ4bFJyRXlvUUtIaHlmeXc9PSJ9]]>. We encourage you to visit the website today and explore.
Please click here <[[mailto:myaerospaceportalissue@honeywell.com?subject=EGPWS MK VIII Query]]> if you have any questions concerning operation or access to Honeywell websites.
Best regards,
The Honeywell EGPWS Team
If you no longer wish to receive these emails, click on the following link: Unsubscribe <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2017_Email_Confirmation_OptOut.html]]>
